scanOrButton: Scan the QR-code with APLink or use the button of Launch.
openAPLink: Please open APLink Wallet to review and sign the transaction.
review: Please review and sign the transaction in the linked wallet.
signManually: Sign manually or with another device
accept: or accept the fee shown below to pay for these costs.
account: Your account lacks the network resources for this transaction and it cannot be covered for free.
wantToSign: Want to sign with another device or didn’t get the signing request in your wallet, scan this QR or copy request and paste in app.
unableDeliver: Unable to deliver the request to “{deviceName}”.
unableDeliverLinkWallet: Unable to deliver the request to the linked wallet.
